topics.body: So that was Daredevil. And the best way to describe ot is this. Imagine all of the things that the 2003 Daredevil film did wrong. And now correct all of those things. And BOOM, Daredevil in a nutshell. Is it worth your time? I'd say so.
topics.author: 4fde4618945b700aa0002fff

topics.body: Now to see how they handle The Immortal Iron Fist. A man who gets his superpowers from beating a literal dragon to death, with nothing but his fists, and then punching said dragon in the heart.
topics.author: 4fde4618945b700aa0002fff

topics.body:
I had a dream that my living room was flooded and when it drained there was a two or three foot long crocodile with flippers instead of legs sunbathing at my window with her baby and then she went and made a nest under my couch and cuddled with my dogs. She was kinda adorable. 

In the dream I was still scared she was gonna eat my dogs though.
